name: Hotel Suite Palace
about: Offering a terrace and garden view, Suite Palace Apartment is situated in Dhaka, 500 m from High Commission of Malaysia and 700 m from Embassy of Italy. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. This apartment will provide guests with 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV and air conditioning.Popular points of interest near the apartment include High Commission of Pakistan, Embassy of Russian Federation and Embassy of the United Arab Emirates.

name: HOTEL THE CAPITAL LTD.
about: The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, slippers and free toiletries. At HOTEL THE CAPITAL LTD. Rooms come with bed linen and towels.

name: Grand Circle Inn Hotel & Suites
about: All guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, slippers and free toiletries. The units will provide guests with air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV. Guests at Grand Circle Inn Hotel & can enjoy a continental breakfast

name: Spring Hill Apartments
about: All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar, a kettle, a shower, slippers and a desk. Rooms are equipped with a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while some rooms have a balcony. All units at the hotel come with a seating area.

name: Maple Crest Service Apartment
about: At the hotel, each room has a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. At Maple Crest Service Apartment the rooms are equipped with a seating area.

name: Hotel Omni Residency
about: At the hotel the rooms include air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hot tub, slippers and a hairdryer. At Hotel Omni Residency each room is equipped with bed linen and towels.

name: Jatra Flagship Dhaka Lake View
about: At the hotel all rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a lake view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The units feature a safety deposit box.

name: Maple Crest Service Apartment
about: Popular points of interest near Maple Crest Service Apartment include BRAC University, Embassy of Qatar and Embassy of Spain.

name: Grand Circle Inn Hotel & Suites
about: All guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, slippers and free toiletries. The units will provide guests with air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV.

name: Radisson Blu Olympiyskiy Hotel
about: The hotel houses Fire Lake Grill House, allowing its guests to taste seasonal, organic and local specialties. For a great cocktail experience, stop by the ARILD Bar. ARILD Bar enhances the hotel experience for the guests who stay in suites. The Conference Floor of the Radisson Blu Olympiyskiy Hotel includes 6 fully equipped meeting rooms, a spacious ballroom and a designated smoking room.
